definition: long dark night/fig. long period of misery and oppression
lit. many nights under a harsh moon/long years of oppression (idiom)

sentences.english: All night long, you can feel my heart palpitates.
sentences.chinese: 长夜漫漫，你能否感觉我的心跳。

sentences.english: Its a long night, no mood to sleep.
All night long night oil lamp, I traveled difficult to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 油尽灯灭如斯长夜，我辗转难入睡。

sentences.english: Nothing can keep us from walking off the livelong night.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能阻拦我们走出这漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: The dawns on the top of that mountain are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 长夜躺在你的路边，黎明在朦胧的山后睡眠。

sentences.english: He that can read an meditate will not find his evenings long or life tedious.
sentences.chinese: 会读书思索的人不会感到长夜无聊或生活乏味。

sentences.english: One man said it was getting towards the long days and the short nights now.
sentences.chinese: 只听见有一个人在说，现今是快到日长夜短的时刻了。

sentences.english: And life's long night is ended, and he way Lies open onward to eternal day.
sentences.chinese: 生命的漫漫长夜已尽，大路开展，奔向永恒的白日。

sentences.english: Will I found you and make it through the night?
sentences.chinese: 我会找到你并且熬过漫漫长夜吗？

sentences.english: Through the long nights of angry weather.
sentences.chinese: 在狂风暴雨的漫漫长夜中。

sentences.english: Through the lonely night and cold desert, I always love you.
sentences.chinese: 穿过寂寞的长夜与荒寒的沙漠我一直都爱你。

sentences.english: They and their teams stayed with us through the long night.
sentences.chinese: 他们和他们的团队同我们一起熬过这漫漫长夜。

sentences.english: Light could emerge even of the blackest of the northern night.
sentences.chinese: 即使是北方最黑暗的长夜也会露出光明。

sentences.english: He that can read an meditate will not find hellos evenings long or life tedious.
sentences.chinese: 会念书思索的人不会感应长夜无聊或者生活寡味。

sentences.english: Don’t hint at it either by asking if she had a long night.
sentences.chinese: 也不要问她是否长夜无眠来暗示。

sentences.english: It came as a joyous daybreak to end the long light of captivity.
sentences.chinese: 恰似结束漫漫长夜禁锢的欢畅黎明。

definition: the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
late at night/in the dead of night
